summary: Extreme Fortify Restoration, Smithing and Alchemy
descriptionHtml: This Mod is good for Leveling up skills quick, and creating extremely powerful armor, and enchantments. It boost your skills 60,000%. There are Three Potions included in this mod. They are Extreme Fortify Restoration, Extreme Fortify Smithing, and Extreme Fortify Alchemy. Each potion has a duration of 60 minutes, so no need to rush around like if you were doing the restoration glitch. I've added a chest to Breezehome upstairs in the loft. It has 1000 of each potion
author: Steelers1
